subject: RE: MailChimp Template Test - "Bridge to School - Issue 2"

action.text: Joao Henriques assigned to Joao Henriques

full_threads.body:
Hi Joao
Thanks for clarifying.
I’ve made updates to the summaries directly in Mailchimp; and checked the full articles via the back end and made most of my edits there (I didn’t realise this feature existed!)
One thing I wasn’t able to do – is it possible to add a space under each numbered point in the ‘safe ride to school’ article? The points look very bunched up.
After that, I’m just waiting on feedback for on additional article to replace the free morning routine download – then we’re good to go.
Thanks
Michelle

From: Joao Henriques <joao@wolfiq.com.au>
Sent: Thursday, September 20, 2018 6:00 PM
To: Michelle Mowbray <michelle@readytoread.com.au>
Cc: David Mowbray <david@readytoread.com.au>; Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ <heath@wolfiq.com.au>
Subject: Re: MailChimp Template Test - "Bridge to School - Issue 2"

Hi Michelle,

Regarding the summaries copy, there’s no limit but ideally would be great if we add the same number of lines for the articles in the same row, this way we can keep the images nicely aligned.

The 404 error you are getting is because the articles are still not linked with the final blog post links. At the moment the articles are created in Ready to Read backend and saved as drafts, once they are approved we will publish them and link with the mailchimp newsletter.

Would it be possible if you could login into Ready to Read website and go to the “Post” section, there you will be able to see the draft articles (first 6 in the list). To visualise them just click “Preview” inside each article.

Regarding the stretched images when you forward the test mailchimp newsletter, we believe it’s because you are using Outlook and sometimes it’s just what it does…it’s Outlook :) Once we send the edm to everyone, it will be fine, it’s just when it’s forwarded.

Please let us know if you need to change anything.

Thanks.
JOAO HENRIQUES
SENIOR DESIGNER - WOLFIQ.COM.AU <https://wolfiq.com.au/>
E. joao@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:joao@wolfiq.com.au> | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0413 107 875




> On 20 Sep 2018, at 5:33 pm, Michelle Mowbray <michelle@readytoread.com.au <mailto:michelle@readytoread.com.au>> wrote:
>
> Hi Joao
> I’d like to update these summaries please – will get revised copy to you. Is there a specific word limit or shall I just judge based on the below?
> Also, when I click through to the pages I’m getting a 404 error – when will the pages be ready to review so I can do all at once?
> It seems to stretch out when I forward – is there a way to stop this from happening?
> Thanks
> Michelle
>
> From: michelle@mail136-224.atl41.mandrillapp.com <mailto:michelle@mail136-224.atl41.mandrillapp.com> <michelle@mail136-224.atl41.mandrillapp.com <mailto:michelle@mail136-224.atl41.mandrillapp.com>> On Behalf Of michelle@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:michelle@wolfiq.com.au>
